channel.title: Podcast on thingsithinkithink
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on thingsithinkithink

item.title: How AI is making its way into Government
item.description: I’ve been thinking recently about how to frame the ways that (generative) AI is going to make its way into enterprise and the public sector. A recent podcast interview between Professor Alan Brown and Think Tank touched upon this.

item.title: Open Models in 2024: Progress and Challenges
item.description: I recently watched a talk from LatentSpace Live (NeurIPS 2024) by Luca Soldaini a research scientist at the AI Institute, on the state of open models in 2024. His reflections on how far we’ve come—and the challenges ahead—offer a good perspective on where (actually-open)AI might be heading.
